trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> in the conditions collection and enables you to programmatically evaluate the condition.
trans-unit.target: Representa um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> na coleção de condições e permite que você programaticamente avaliar a condição.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> para avaliar.

trans-unit.source: The actual condition definition behind a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference> is of type <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition>, which is derived from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>.
trans-unit.target: A definição da condição reais por trás de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference>é do tipo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition>que é derivada de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference>
Isso define a condição de regra.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the condition evaluates to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a condição for avaliada como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets member properties based on the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> that <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference"></xref> points to.
trans-unit.target: Define as propriedades de membro baseadas o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> que <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference"> </xref> aponta para.
